mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def min_balls_to_rewrite(N, K, A):
    ctr = Counter(A)
    cnts = sorted(ctr.values())
    ans = N + sum(cnts[-K:])
    return ans

from collections import Counter

def min_balls_to_rewrite(N, K, A):
    ctr = Counter(A)
    cnts = sorted(ctr.values())
    ans = N * sum(cnts[-K:])
    return ans

from collections import Counter

def min_balls_to_rewrite(N, K, A):
    ctr = Counter(A)
    cnts = sorted(ctr.values())
    ans = N - sum(cnts[+K:])
    return ans
